document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Palaearctic, introduced to Azores, Canary Islands , Madeira Archipelago, Nearctic and Neotropical Region ( Alonso-Zarazaga 2013 )

Biology. Coniferous and mixed forests. Adults occur in V–VII. On
Pinus sylvestris
,
P. banksiana
( Pinaceae ) ( Smreczyński 1972 ).
